resources.string: Please enter a number between 1 and 12. Full tolerance reset occurs after 12 days
Get Psyched is for users at least 18 years of age. We do not condone the use of any legal or illegal substances; this app is meant to be used as an educational and harm reduction resource

Thank you for choosing Get Psyched! We aim to be your go-to source for information and harm reduction tips. The first version of this app only contains information about LSD, but will be updated over time to include different mushrooms and DMT. Once that is finished we will start adding other tryptamines, phenethylamines and various research chemicals.
You will need to take %dug to feel the effects of %dug after %d days

Warning - This is a close estimate. This is not an exact science yet as it is near impossible to know what dose you are taking without a laboratory, and the science has not been allowed to fully catch up yet.\n\nThanks to u/AdmiralAcid for working on the formula.
